morgan Missel university college freshman and Yumi Morooka Ritsumeikan Univeristy in Japan playing ring toss at the Japanese Culture Night held at Jim Thorpe PERIOD

Japanese and American students converged Tuesday night to experience each others culture and to say goodbye after a month of getting to know each other PERIOD

Japan Night one of many cultural events happening this month was hosted by the Japanese Student Association which works handinhand with Ritsumeikan an intercultural exchange program that brings Japanese students to OU every year said Minkee Kim a human resources and management junior and member of the association PERIOD

These students experience American culture and end their monthlong stay by helping the Japanese Student Association organize Japan Night she said PERIOD

This was the first time in a decade Japan Night was in festival form PERIOD Usually the event centers around a stage with a Master of Ceremonies introducing cultural performances while light refreshments are served PERIOD This year the association decided to set up booths and activities in addition to the Karate Club ninja dance performances and Arashi Taiko which is Japanese drumming Kim said PERIOD

It is basically like the high school spring festivals they have in Japan Kim said PERIOD You can see its such a big success PERIOD If JSA can survive into next year and recover its membership well definitely do it again. the purpose of culture nights is to raise awareness about particular cultures and to allow students to connect through diversity Kim said PERIOD

Its important to recognize that not everyone from Japan will identify with the culture showcased at Japan Night not every person from Africa does the same kind of dance not every person from China will act the same way said Sitta Tarawally a junior in the College of Fine Arts PERIOD

No it doesnt remind me of home said Yumi Morooka an international relations major and participant in the Ritsumeikan Intercultural Exchange Program PERIOD It feels like Im in an old movie PERIOD Thats OK though I like American movies. robust news organizations like ours generate civic good that informs improves and inspires communities PERIOD For those invested in OU and Norman OU Daily uniquely has
